bboxes.reason: Bounding box 12 best fits the 'digital_display' control element by completely enclosing the digital screen area that displays the feedback.

The bounding box 1 correctly encloses the button labeled 'Cycle,' the pressing area of the control element 'cycle_button.' The bounding box satisfies the selection criteria for covering the button's interactive area.
Bounding box 2 encompasses the physical button associated with the 'crust' label, which aligns with the criteria for selecting the area of interaction.

Bounding box 3 best covers the pressing area of the 'Loaf Size' button, which is the designated interactive control element for adjusting the loaf size. Other bounding boxes primarily focus on nearby labels or unrelated elements.
The '+'' button, part of the 'delay_timer_plus_button' element, is an executable region. Bounding box 4 accurately captures the button's area, respecting the criteria for button selection.
Bounding box 5 captures the delay_timer_minus_button, encompassing the pressing area of the button, which matches the described element.
The bounding box with index 7 captures the pressing area of the physical button labeled 'Start/Stop,' which is the correct control element as per the identification criteria.
